price: Macho yao yatainama; watatoka makaburini kama nzige walio tawanyika!
arabic: خُشَّعًا أَبۡصَٰرُهُمۡ يَخۡرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡأَجۡدَاثِ كَأَنَّهُمۡ جَرَادٞ مُّنتَشِرٞ
footnotes: Macho yao yatainamia chini kwa wingi wa kitisho, wakitoka makaburini kama kwamba ni nzige walio tawanyika, kwa wingi wao na mbio zao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: khushaʿan abṣāruhum yakhrujūna mina al-ajdāthi ka-annahum jarādun muntashirun
